newsitem.title: CHINA: Pratama Datakom Asia sets US$260 mln bond.
newsitem.headline: Pratama Datakom Asia sets US$260 mln bond.

text.p: Pratama Datakom Asia BV has launched a US$260 million bond guaranteed by Indonesian company PT Datakom Asia, lead manager Merrill Lynch said on Thursday.
The callable 144a bond matures in 2005.
It pays a semi-annual coupon of 12.75 percent and was priced and re-offered at par.
Details are as follows:

***THE COMPANY WILL USE A PORTION OF THE PROCEEDS
